name: Trash Panda Inc
description:
You play as Beans! A small raccoon with a big heart.

The galaxy is full of messy spaceships in desperate need of a clean.

Beans is the newest employee at his grandpa’s company, who have been

solely responsible for the clean-up of the galaxy for over 55 years.

Still wet behind the ears Beans is eager to continue in his grandfather’s

footsteps but little does he know; it may not be as easy as he first thought.

This Project was part of my Year 2 Group Project studies built with a team of 9 people within Unity.

The Game Runs on Windows but requires an Xbox Controller to play.

Development time - 2
